name: Four In a Row
description: This project is a 2-player game of four-in-a-row that was built using Object-oriented JavaScript.

name: Scoreboard
description: A Scoreboard made with React that features a stopwatch.

name: Phrase Hunter
description: A Phrase Hunter game that is built using Object-oriented JavaScript.

name: Public API Requests
description: This project is a webpage that uses fetch API to display employees information from a database and also showcase the usage of modal windows.

name: Random Quote Generator
description: A project that uses vanilla JavaScript to randomly display quotes on the screen.

name: Library Manager
description: This is a book database manager that uses Express.js and Node.js. It performs all CRUD operation and also uses Sequelize for the SQLite connection and PUG for templates.
